Global Corporate Training Consulting Company

Top training company that provides training services, custom employee learning solutions, eLearning development, system implementation training, skilled instructional designers and contract trainers.

A Training Needs Assessment is the method of determining if a training need exists and, if it does, what training is required to fill the gap. Download our Training Needs Assessment Infographic for more insight.

Leading Training Services Company

To stay relevant and competitive in today's fast-paced business world, your employees must perform at their best. TrainingFolks delivers engaging and innovative corporate training programs that strategically align with your business goals.                

Whether you are looking for instructional design services, system implementation training, custom eLearning development, or corporate trainers, as a top training consultant company - we have you covered! 

Training Needs Assessment



Our skilled Instructional Design consultants will work with your team to deliver the right training needs analysis to identify and address your learner knowledge and skills gaps. Download free training needs assessment templates and tools today.

Instructional Design Consulting Services



Our top instructional designers provide employee-centric learning design based on your learners' needs and training program objectives.  Contact us today to learn more about how our instructional design consulting services can help your organization.

System Implementation Training

System Implementation
of new technologies like Salesforce, SAP, Workday, Microsoft Dynamics 365, and more.  Our team of training consultants will create results-driven system implementation strategies and training.

Custom eLearning Design and Development

Create new custom eLearning programs, maintain existing ones or take in-class training content online with TrainingFolks' dedicated team of experienced eLearning developers.


Global Contract Trainers



Train sales and services teams and more with the right corporate trainer.  With a network of over 30,000 training consultants, TrainingFolks is your top contract training services provider.

Learning Management System (LMS) 



Improve your overall learner experience while easily managing company training and development records, data and reports with a fully hosted LMS solution from TrainingFolks.  See what your learner portal could look like with a free demo.

TrainingFolks Has the Training Solutions for Your Business Challenges  

Are you dealing with any of these business challenges?

  • Experiencing a high turnover rate with new employees
  • Supporting System Implementation Training
  • Developing effective management training for leaders
  • Integrating compliance and risk training training
  • Supporting sales and customer service teams with effective training

Our expert training consultants understand the demands of today's global business environment and are ready to demonstrate a solution that will dramatically increase productivity.  Contact the team at TrainingFolks today to address your current corporate training and development challenges today.

Hire The Best-Fit Corporate Learning Consultant

Do you need to hire a team of qualified contract trainers across multiple regions and on short notice?
 
Our dedicated recruitment team will find the right learning professional for your specific job requirements including:

  • Corporate Trainers
  • Instructional Designers
  • Change Managers
  • Instructional Technologists
  • Business Analysts
  • eLearning Developers
  • Technical Writers

Give your organization the edge with fast access to highly qualified training professionals from our private global network of over 30,000 candidates who encompass the experience you are seeking. 
Free Employee Training and Development Materials 

We want your organization to succeed in reaching your projected business goals.
Download your free leadership development guide, training needs assessment questions, and other helpful corporate training materials. 

Executive Search and Placement  

Losing top executives to turnover can cost the organization millions.

Working with a top executive search and placement firm like TrainingFolks ensures your learning leaders are a Best-Fit match to your corporate culture and specific company needs. 

Download your free company culture assessment.

Leadership Development Training

Build stronger leaders to ensure the future success of your organization by empowering a diverse range of leadership styles and perspectives.

TrainingFolks offers leadership development training designed to prepare managers for the challenges of a constantly evolving workplace.


Download your free eBook on developing Millennial Leaders today.

Employee Onboarding 

Save thousands of dollars, improve engagement and increase employee performance overall with the right employee onboarding process.

Set your new hires up for success from day one on the job with best practices.


Download your free employee onboarding checklist and more today.

Sales and Customer Service Training

Ensure your sales and customer service teams are up to speed on the latest technologies, products and services, and processes.

Create the right corporate sales and customer service training in-class, with vILT or with eLearning. 


Download our free Training Needs Assessment template today.

 
Our Industry Experience

Financial Services Training

Transportation and Logistics

Technology

Retail Sales Training

Manufacturing

Healthcare Training

Training and Development

Energy

An award winning provider of custom employee training and development programs and support for over two decades:


 

 

Some of Our Valued Clients

We are proud of our corporate training partnerships with some of the world's largest and most successful companies.

Working with TrainingFolks is always a pleasure. Their team has helped us provide customers with interactive eLearning content that surpasses any competitive offering. Their content has transformed the way we engage our users and is leaving them well informed and satisfied. All we can ask for is more!

   - Josh Miller, eLearning Expert, Agilent Technologies

 

request more information »

View more of our clients »

 

Are you ready to elevate your learning organization?

Contact us › 

TrainingFolks

1-866-TR-FOLKS (1-866-873-6557)

Fax: 1-905-850-9866

US Office

Cary, NC 27513-5787
Phone: 1-866-873-6557

Woodbridge, Ontario L4H 3H9
